attributes.action: INNOCENT PEOPLE ARE GOING TO KEEP ON BEING KILLED IF “THE GOOD WORD” IS NOT RELEASED LIVE AND TO THE WORLD
attributes.additional_details: James and Leyla Ergun need the government to take action by bringing James and Leyla Ergun to 10 Downing Street or to the House of Commons so they can release The Creators “Good Word” live and to the world. My brother and I are both messengers chosen by The Creator. Peace on earth can only begin now with the releasing of the “Good Word” Please help the innocent. Thank you, Leyla Ergun
